B

BackButton - Class in view
this class provides both the graphical properties of the back button as well as the logic for when the button is pressed.
BackButton(GameWindow, String) - Constructor for class view.BackButton
sets the text of the button, and the view that it refers to.
backButton - Static variable in class view.SideBar
back-button button
bckGrnd - Variable in class view.CellButton
represents the Background Colour
bestMove - Static variable in class model.MiniMaxTest

the colour black
black - Static variable in class view.GameWindow

board - Static variable in class controller.PlayerContext
the model that this controller is updating
Board - Class in model
this is the entry point into the model of the tic tac toe game.
Board() - Constructor for class model.Board
 
board - Static variable in class model.Board
the internal representation of the board
board - Static variable in class model.MiniMaxEngine

board - Static variable in class model.MiniMaxTest
 
board - Static variable in class view.GameWindow
for storing an instance of BoardPanel component
BoardPanel - Class in view
A BoardPanel object IS a Jpanel, it just specifies a little bit how the JPanel should look.
BoardPanel(GameWindow) - Constructor for class view.BoardPanel
Constructor uses some private helper methods to initialise the BoardPanel object, the helper methods: defineButtons(), addButtons() and addActionListner() deal with the buttons.
boardSideBar - Static variable in class view.GameWindow
reference to sideBar
bottomCenter - Static variable in class view.BoardPanel

more buttons to populate the board with
bottomRight - Static variable in class view.BoardPanel
more buttons to populate the board with
button - Static variable in class run
 
buttons - Static variable in class view.BoardPanel
an array to store the buttons in, makes it easier to index the buttons
